meanings.sent1: She unthinkingly agreed to the plan without realizing the consequences.
meanings.sent2: He unthinkingly walked into the room without knocking first.
meanings.sent3: The cat unthinkingly knocked over the vase while chasing a toy.
meanings.sent4: The wind unthinkingly scattered the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The child unthinkingly touched the hot stove and quickly pulled back in pain.

meanings.definition: In a thoughtless or careless manner.
meanings.sent1: He unthinkingly left his phone on the bus seat and forgot about it.
meanings.sent2: She unthinkingly spent all her money on unnecessary items.
meanings.sent3: The student unthinkingly submitted the wrong assignment online.
meanings.sent4: The driver unthinkingly ran a red light and narrowly avoided an accident.
meanings.sent5: The chef unthinkingly added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
